item.description:
Location will be in the Bank of America parking area (near Tri-City plaza) in Vernon. We will meet at 10:00 a.m., wave signs for an hour or so and then head out to the designated literature-drop areas.

The literature drops go much faster and are in general easier than canvassing. I'm going to pre-sort handouts as best I can so this lit drop will be the most productive yet.

We have the handouts. We have the yard signs. We have DVD's. We need Ron Paul supporters in the streets getting this material to the uninformed masses.
item.how_to_find_us: I drive a silver car with a Ron Paul sign on the door.
item.name: Saturday sign wave and lit-drop in Vernon
